text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionUrgent communication is needed
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:party 1..1Extensionparty to inform
url 1..1uri"party"
value[x] 0..1Reference(BePractitioner | BeOrganization | BePatient)Value of extension
extension:instructions 0..1ExtensionFor example 'Try phone first but also send SMS and e-mail'
url 1..1uri"instructions"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
extension:contactway 0..*ExtensionWill override any other known channel for partner for urgent communication
Slices for extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:contactSystem 1..1ExtensionExtension
Binding: BeCommunicationMethod (preferred)
url 1..1uri"contactSystem"
value[x] 0..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
extension:contactSystemValue 1..1ExtensionExtension
url 1..1uri"contactSystemValue"
value[x] 0..1stringValue of extension
url 1..1uri"contactway"
value[x] 0..0
url 1..1uri"https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/StructureDefinition/be-ext-urgent-communication"
value[x] 0..0

name: BeUrgentCommunication
title: BeUrgentCommunication
description: When there is a need to urgently communicate results of an order.

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

element.comment: There can be no stigma associated with the use of extensions by any application, project, or standard - regardless of the institution or jurisdiction that uses or defines the extensions. element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.

element.definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html) for a list).
